snippet.title: The Sims 2 Castaway DS Gameplay
snippet.description: Since I was running the game on an emulator it was not possible to blow through the mic when there was no mic, sorry. I just want to give people who want this game for ds a heads up before they buy it (its different then the other platforms!)
